title: House on the Outskirts of Paris
credit_line: Acquired through the generosity of the Sarah Mellon Scaife Family
provenance_text:
Henri Julien Rousseau [1844-1910], Paris, France; Max Weber [1881-1961], Great Neck, Long Island, NY, 1908 until 1961 [1]; Mrs. Max Weber (Frances Abrams Weber), Great Neck, Long Island, NY [2]; Richard L. Feigen & Company, Inc., New York, NY; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1969.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased from the artist in 1908.
[2]. The painting was on extended loan from Mrs. Weber, in memoriam Max Weber, at The Rose Art Museum, Brandeis University, Waltham, MA, 1962-1966.

creator.birth_place: Laval (Mayenne, Pays de la Loire, France)
